Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB RAM, OpenGL 3.3
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB RAM, OpenGL 4.5
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

results.name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails to Azure – Launch Week Bundle

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 with 3GB of video RAM or Radeon RX 580 with 4GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 3.6 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX or Radeon RX5600 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.6Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 bit Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5/AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 280x/GeForce GTX770
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 bit Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5/AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 280x/GeForce GTX770 or higher
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
